word:
What the Seal of God Is 

     Just as soon as the people of God are sealed in their foreheads--it is not any seal or mark that can be seen, 
                                                                           220
but a settling into the truth, both intellectually and spiritually, so they cannot be moved--just as soon as God's people are sealed and prepared for the shaking, it will come. Indeed, it has begun already.--4BC 1161 (1902).
